greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} phi(d)^(d-1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..388
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, EulerPhi[#]^(#-1) &]; Array[a, 20] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Mar 14 2021 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, eulerphi(n/gcd(k, n))^(n/gcd(k, n)-2));
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 13 2021
